rules.description: Never create migration files directly. Instead, use Laravel's artisan commands to generate migrations.

examples.incorrect: Creating migration files manually in database/migrations/

rules.description: After generating a migration, you may modify the generated file to add your schema definitions.

examples.correct: Modify the generated migration file to add table columns and relationships
examples.incorrect: Creating new migration files without using artisan

migrations.naming_convention: Use snake_case for migration names and prefix with create_ for new tables
